@EnvAgencyMids @CommunitiesPrep I‚Äôm interested when will you have a webinar to discuss the Environmental crisis with @PHE_uk relating to Walleys Landfill-health & stink issues effecting 1000‚Äôs! @EnvAgency failure to act is a disgrace @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: Last year I was lucky to be a judge on the @BBCWomansHour Power List: Our Planet. As it is #IWD2021 here are 30 inspiring women whose work is making a significant positive contribution to the environment and the sustainability of our planet: https://t.co/ftBvN5ceoS @EnvAgency
#ODX @EnvAgency just published details on how to safely/correctly dispose of Lateral Flow Tests. Must be expecting a lot then to be used then discarded https://t.co/1NoNXSeWrM

We are responding to a pollution incident at Cardinham Water, Bodmin following the theft of diesel oil from a distribution depot. Absorbent pads and booms have been deployed in the river to reduce any environmental impact. The watercourse is a tributary of the River Fowey. https://t.co/LyDV8vYubC
